title: Carlos Alcaraz Wins Tennis Match Fast in Qatar
summary: Carlos Alcaraz, a Spanish tennis player, won a big tennis match called the Qatar Open in Doha. He beat Arthur Fils from France in only 50 minutes, which is very fast. The score was 6-2 and 6-1, meaning Alcaraz won most of the games. This is his 12th win this year and his 26th trophy ever. Alcaraz said he was hungry for more wins and played great tennis. He broke Fils' serve early and hit many winners. Fils got frustrated and broke his racquet, but he congratulated Alcaraz after the match. This win is special because Alcaraz lost in Qatar last year.
